name: Horde Demon
damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; damage from nonmagical weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The demon makes two attacks  using any attack granted by its Varied Shapes trait.

special_abilities.name: Chaotic Evil
special_abilities.desc: The demon radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

special_abilities.name: Radiant Weakness
special_abilities.desc: If the demon takes radiant damage while it is bloodied, it is frightened for 1 minute.

special_abilities.name: Varied Shapes
special_abilities.desc: Each horde demon has a unique combination of attacks and powers. Roll 1d10 once or twice, rerolling duplicates, or choose one or two features from the following table. A horde demons features determine the attacks it can make.

special_abilities.name: 1 Bat Head
special_abilities.desc: The demon emits a 15-foot cone of cacophonous sound. Each creature in the area makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) thunder damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

special_abilities.name: 2 Bulging Eyes (Gaze)
special_abilities.desc: A creature within 60 feet makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage and is frightened until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: 3 Claws
special_abilities.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: 4 Fangs
special_abilities.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: 5 Goat Horns
special_abilities.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage and the target makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw, falling prone on a failure.

special_abilities.name: 6 Lamprey Mouth
special_abilities.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the lamprey mouth attack can be used only on this target and automatically hits.

special_abilities.name: 7 Porcupine Quills
special_abilities.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: 8 Scorpion Tail Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft
special_abilities.desc: , one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: 9 Tentacle Arms Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft
special_abilities.desc: , one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the tentacle arms attack can only be used on this target.

special_abilities.name: 10 Whispering Mouth
special_abilities.desc: The demon targets a creature within 30 feet that can hear it. The target makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it takes 7 (1d8 + 3) psychic damage and is magically cursed until the start of the demons next turn. While cursed, the demons attacks against the target are made with advantage, and the target has disadvantage on saving throws against the demons Whispering Mouth.
